label: 文章得業生
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
見出し読み: もんじょとくぎょうせい
説明文: an advanced scholar of letters chosen from those studying at the Royal University (Daigaku 大学) who might serve as future faculty after successfully passing examinations. The status was created in 730, when two such posts were instituted.
